extendedInfo.description: Get the most awesome cheats for the games you play! Grab these cheats, game reviews, game guides, secret codes and tricks of the latest games. Be the best and get the highest score with our apps!We have brought you the best information possible to help you walkthrough all you games. Get the latest information on how to beat your favorite game.This app requires an internet connection to view all the amazing video cheats and websites.This app, upon your approval, will add an icon to your home screen linking to more awesome games and other cool android features which you can delete anytime. If you choose to use it, it will help us create more amazing content and makes us some money to keep our team working hard for you. We appreciate your support!This app is not authorized or created by the authors or legal representatives of the video game for which this app was made for. This application complies with US Copyright law guidelines of "fair use". If you feel there is a direct copyright or trademark violation that doesn't follow within the "fair use" guidelines please contact us to discuss.
